name: Coronavirus
title: The Coronavirus just hitted the U. S. A.
description: Due to the coronavirus, all businness are closed and people do not know what is about to happen to the economy.

name: Government incentives
title: The U. S. A. government just invested 10T on companies to counter the coronavirus crisis.
description: Due to the coronavirus, the world's economy is passing throug the worst crisis since 1929. The U. S. A. government gave away incentives to people and invested in the stock market to counter it.

name: USA ellections
title: The U. S. A. is close to presidential elections.
description: The U. S. A. is close to presidential elections. There is a lot of uncertainty around the world about the stability of the country.

name: The government stabilizes
title: After the uncertainty, the goverment stabilizes.
description: The new cabinet has everything under control. The economy's growth returns to normal.

title: Lehman brothers goes bankrupt!
description: The bank, Lehman brothers, filed for bankruptcy. Many institutions get affected and a chain of events causes a global crisis.

name: Post-crisis
title: Post crisis expansion
description: After 2008's crisis, economy is getting stable and new startups are appearing.

name: Apple
title: AAPL just reached 2T market cap!
description: Apple just reached the 2T market cap due to a solid strategy. It raises up the expectations for other tech firms.

name: Tesla
title: Tesla just realised a new line of cars. As always, lots of innovation and new features at a reasonable price.
description: Apple just reached the 2T market cap due to a solid strategy. It raises up the expectations for other tech firms.

name: WWB
title: Wallstreet bets just inflated the market
description: The subredit WallStreetBets decided to inflate the market to 'make rich people angry'.

name: Robinhood
title: Rich people got angry
description: Robinhood (a stock trader app) does not allow people to buy artificially inflated stocks, but they do allow to sell them.

name: Airbnb
title: Airbnb is a game changer
description: Airbnb lets people rent their properties, now it is easier to monetize real estate

name: .com bubble
title: .com bubble.
description: Tech startups fall down, stock prices were artificially inflated.

name: Prices return to normal
title: Prices return to normal
description: After the .com bubble, the companies that survived's stock price is now their real value
